author: rooneg
msg: Fix part of issue 2530.  This makes it possible to revert a merge that
turns a file into a symlink.  It turns out to be a problem when there
are no properties on the original file, which meant there was no revert
version of the properties, so by the time revert got around to doing
the copy-and-translate bit the svn:special property was still set, with
(svn_wc__save_prop_file): Add new write_empty parameter, which lets
us write out a prop file even if it has no contents, as we need for
(svn_wc_add_repos_file2): Handle the case where there's no prop file.

author: djames
msg: * STATUS: Move approved changes to the approved section.

author: blair
msg: Note the -l or --log command line option in the usage text.
